posts.title: R에서 여러 패키지 이용해서 벤다이어그램 그리기
posts.text: 출처: https://bio-kcs.tistory.com/entry/R-Venn-diagram%EC%9D%84-%EA%B7%B8%EB%A6%AC%EB%8A%94-%ED%8C%A8%ED%82%A4%EC%A7%80-5%EA%B0%9C-%EB%B9%84%EA%B5%90 R에서 벤다이어그램 그리기코드12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879808182838485868788################################################### Load data##################################################clusters,loo_resultsload(file = "G:/내 드라이브/Desktop/대학원생활/24-2학기/GBM/Robjects/LOOV_final_clusters.RData") #result_list,diff_exp_of_type,signature_of_type,load(file='G:/내 드라이브/Desktop/대학원생활/24-2학기/GBM/Robjects/Signature_identification_250210.RData') #final_signature_list, final_signatureload(file="G:/내 드라이브/Desktop/대학원생활/24-2학기/GBM/Robjects/signature_results.RData")################################################### Q1. Signature list venndiagram#################################################sig_lst=lapply(final_signature_list,function(df) rownames(df))#install.packages("gplots")#install.packages("VennDiagram")#if (!require(devtools)) install.packages("devtools") #devtools::install_github("gaospecial/ggVennDiagram")#install.packages("UpSetR")library(ggVennDiagram)library(UpSetR)library(VennDiagram)library(gplots)#gplot #가장 기본적인 plotvenn1 <- gplots::venn(sig_lst)#VennDiagramVennDiagram::venn.diagram( x = sig_lst, category.names = c("Group1", "Group2", "Group3", "Group4", "Group5"), filename = './Figure/Bulk/4.LOO_result_analysis/venn_diagram.png', main = "", output=F, col=c("#440154ff", '#21908dff', '#fde725ff', "#E7298A",'skyblue'), height = 9, width = 11, resolution = 500, units = "in", imagetype = "png", fill = c("#440154ff", '#21908dff', '#fde725ff', "#E7298A",'skyblue'), cex = 2, fontfamily = "sans", cat.cex = 1.5, cat.default.pos = "outer", cat.fontfamily = "sans", cat.col = c("#440154ff", '#21908dff', '#fde725ff', "#E7298A",'skyblue'))#ggVennDiagramp <- ggVennDiagram(sig_lst, label_alpha = 0, category.names = c("Group1", "Group2", "Group3", "Group4", "Group5"))+ scale_fill_gradient(low = "#F4FAFE", high = "#4981BF")pggsave("./Figure/Bulk/4.LOO_result_analysis/venn3.png", width = 7, height = 7, dpi = 300, device = png, type = "cairo", bg = "transparent")#만든 plot을 ppt로 옮겨서 편집 가능 #install.packages('officer')#install.packages('rvg')library(officer)library(rvg)# 빈 pptx만들기 read_pptx() %>% print(target = "./Figure/Bulk/example.pptx")read_pptx( "./Figure/Bulk/example.pptx")# 편집 가능한 이미지로 변환editable_graph <- rvg::dml(ggobj = p)# 그림 저장 read_pptx( "./Figure/Bulk/example.pptx") %>% add_slide("Title Slide","Office Theme") %>% ph_with(editable_graph, location = ph_location(left=0, top=0,width = 3, height = 3, bg="transparent")) %>% print(target = "./Figure/Bulk/example.pptx")
